{
"filterType":"dedupeFields",
"fields":[
"marketoGuid",
"Bedrooms",
"yearBuilt"
],
"input":[
{
"mlsNum":"1962352",
"houseOwnerId":"42645756"
},
{
"mlsNum":"3962352",
"houseOwnerId":"62645756"
}
]
}
